job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree (Business, Computer Science, Engineering, IT Management, Computer Engineering) preferred

secondary: Ability to work with cross-functional teams
all: Ability to work with cross-functional teams

jd: Hi Professionals, This is Arun from GAC solutions Inc. I have an excellent job opportunity with one of our premier clients. Since it is an urgent requirement your prompt response is appreciated Senior Project ManagerOrlando FL - OnsiteContract H1B Consultants OnlyMust be local to Orlando, FL Job Description:Top 3 skills required: 1. Financial disclosures and provide updates.2. Project Management (Ownership, escalation capabilities and provide proper planning), 3. Need to have good English (communication skills) Focus of Activity. Leads and manages medium sized projects that normally fall within scope of experience/expertise.Mandatory Tasks:Typical tasks at this level are indicated within the competency section (above), however, a summary of high-level main responsibilities are.• All aspects of project management for medium size/complexity project (incl. risk, change management, planning, tracking etc)• Defines, documents, and safely executes of medium size projects, directing and counselling project team members, and advising clients/users as necessary on all phases• Liaises with other managers within the IS and ICT functions and within the business; manages expectations for projects• Ensures that own projects are formally closed and, where appropriate, subsequently reviewed.Essential Background Requirements:• Setup and provide good Cadence meetings to resolve and control issues• Educated to bachelor’s degree (Business, Computer Science, Engineering, IT Management, Computer Engineering) preferred, master’s if available but not required• Has 3-5 years prior (IT related) project experience of leading small to medium sized projects• Must be able to manage projects/services in English and has an intermediate English Level (Atos University)• Able to take on projects in which are upgrades or refresh efforts with ease and professional work ethics• Has a proven record of realistic estimation and demonstrates the financial/cost awareness along with the customer facing and behavioural skills to take responsibility for medium size projects or multiple level projects (With introduction of repeatable approaches) Additional requirements include:• Understand and have worked in an Outsourcing environment (At least 3 years experience)• Ability to work with cross-functional teams • Ability to accept accountability and ownership for desired results• Proactive work habits, requiring minimal supervision and management• Required proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Word, PowerPoint, MS Project and other project management tools including basic PC applications• Outstanding interpersonal and analytical skills• Outstanding communication skills (written and verbal) and executive presence• Ability to work independently and with local/remote teamsSolid understanding of the purpose and usage of project tools, such as:• Project Charter• Master Project Control Plan• Business Case & ROI Definition• Issue Logs• Risk Management & Mitigation Planning• Quality Management• Status Reporting• Project Change Control• Change Log• Operational Acceptance• Performance Acceptance• Lessons Learned Documentation• Root Cause Analysis Best Regards, Arun KSenior IT Recruiter
